name: Deadlokk
description:
You are part of a deep-space expedition to secure resources.
Your team’s mission is to establish military supremacy in the sector by destroying the enemy carrier.



Utilize the environment to gain the advantage by pushing enemies into hazardous energy fields.
Crush enemies between asteroids using gravity wells.
Ram enemy ships to prevent them from warping away.



Every class of ship has bonuses to different stats, find your favorite build and adapt to any situation.



Discover custom equipment from the wrecks of destroyed enemies. Recruit Co-Pilots for powerful buffs and abilities.



Your carrier is your base, protect it at all costs.
Carriers can move anywhere on the map and are controlled by team members. Democratically decide the best course of action.
Collaborate with your team to upgrade your carrier using your team's resource pool.
